UPW.questionText: Has the individual gone through any part of a process to change the sex they were assigned at birth to the gender they now identify with, or do they intend to?
Give details and discuss placement options with the individual, based on their gender identity. Record their preference and the details of the conversation.
Is the individual intersex or do they have a Difference in Sexual Development (DSD)?
Do they consider themselves to be transgender or have a transgender history?
UPW.helpText: This could include their name, appearance, the way they dress, taking hormones, or having gender-confirming surgery.

UPW.questionText: Are adjustments required for cultural or religious reasons?
Mark cultural or religious adjustments section as complete?
Mark individual’s details section as complete?
Does the individual have any placement preferences?
Discuss placement options with the individual, based on their gender identity
UPW.helpText: Record their preference and the details of the conversation.

UPW.questionText: Is the individual vulnerable because they are a high-profile person?
UPW.helpText: For example, they are prominent on social media or are well-known in a particular area.

Is the individual eligible for intensive working?
Recommended hours per week in addition to statutory minimum, at the start of the order
UPW.helpText: 7 hours is the standard working day. Maximum of 21 additional hours per week.

UPW.questionText: Recommended hours per week in addition to statutory minimum, at the midpoint of the order
UPW.helpText: 7 hours is the standard working day. Maximum of 21 additional hours per week.

UPW.questionText: At what point should the individual be expected to reach a 28-hour working week?
Mark intensive working section as complete?
